name: Altare Birthday DLC
description:
This is a small game (DLC) for Altare's Birthday.
Estimated Playing Time is about 10-15 min.  

Although I personally recommend to play the main story of the previous game, this DLC is standalone game to play! :)

If there is any suggestions or feedback, please feel free to contact me on twitter!

**English isn’t my first language, I apologize for any mistakes I might make.

CONTROLS

Movement - Arrow Keys
Action/OK - Enter, Z, Space
Cancel/Menu - Esc, X
Dash - Shift
